sentences.english: The rakish actor was known for dating models.
sentences.chinese: 那位風流倜儻的演員愛跟模特兒交往是出了名的。

sentences.english: While you begin to Ti unexpectedly gentle pledged to do violence eccentric and unreasonable later become disobedient.
sentences.chinese: 雖然你開始信誓旦旦溫存倜儻，可後來變得忤戾乖張。

sentences.english: She met Zeke suave romantic and sexual impotence documentary writer Jack.
sentences.chinese: 她結識了風流倜儻的齊克和性無能的紀實作家傑克。

sentences.english: He is in good spirits, handsome and free and strong.
sentences.chinese: 他情緒很好，英俊倜儻，自由自在而又意志堅強。

sentences.english: Libras born with casual and elegant bearing style.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座的人具有天生風流倜儻的風采。

sentences.english: An ambitious person, he was aloof and arrogant, unconventional and unsociable.
sentences.chinese: 他性格孤傲，倜儻不羣，是一個胸有大志的人。

definition: (of a person) valiant and formidable-looking/to carry oneself tall
to have an imposing or impressive appearance/impressive appearance/straight and impressive looking
full of political wisdom (idiom)/politically astute/with encyclopedic experience of state policy
cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
